name: Bitcoin Solitaire
description:
Bitcoin Solitaire is a cross between one of the most popular card games in the world and THE most popular crypto currency in the world! This highly addictive classic card stack game lets you relax and unwind, while still igniting your competitive spirit.

Our customizable version of Klondike solitaire lets you choose from 9 different crypto-themed card backs that are sure to have you saying “to the moon”. Challenge your skills by choosing between 1 or 3 hand draws, and learn when to HODL or fold them. Our straightforward design lets you focus on your personal strategy, while our unlimited hint system gives you some help when you need it.

Easy to Play: The object of the game is to separate and collect all the same suit cards from ace to king in ascending order and place them in the home spot on the top left. You accomplish this by arranging the stacked cards in descending order alternating between colors to free the cards you need and place them in the home spot.

Featuring:
1 card or 3 card draw
Unlimited hints
Timed sessions
Supports iPhone and iPad devices
Bitcoin-themed card backs
Move counter
Auto-complete option
Tap or drag cards to move

We guarantee that with Bitcoin Solitaire, you will always walk away feeling like a winner! Download and discover why Bitcoin Solitaire is ranked above any other crypto-based card game.

PlayDay Studios brings you classic games that require patience and tranquility, while also creating a challenging and fun experience. Bitcoin Solitaire is a collaboration between PlayDay Studios and Bling Financial. You can earn Bling Points in app if you log into your Bling account.
